column4: Hi there, I'm using Ubuntu 10.04 and have just installed it on a new laptop, and when playing a DVD the whole laptop freezes up. I've installed restricted extras and libdvdcss, to no avail.
it also does the same thing when i try to rip a dvd with DVD::RIP
actually one at a time  or  place   a double    &&  in between each command
the command with the install sh  will fix that
